${ModID}:SolemnLament.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Intangible. NL If this card's cost was only paid by ruina:Manifest, add a copy of it into your discard pile.

${ModID}:Wingbeat.NAME: Wingbeat
${ModID}:Wingbeat.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust up to X cards. NL Heal HP and gain Dexterity equal to their combined costs.

${ModID}:Regret.NAME: Regret
${ModID}:Regret.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deal !D! damage again for each Status and Curse in your hand.

${ModID}:GrindingGears.NAME: Grinding Gears
${ModID}:GrindingGears.DESCRIPTION: Take !M! damage. NL Remove !ruina:SecondMagic! card from the *Singing *Machine and add it to your hand. NL *Stun the *Singing *Machine for 1 turn.

${ModID}:Claim.NAME: To Claim Their Bones
${ModID}:Claim.DESCRIPTION: While this card is held, the user can *Counter *Attack for !D! damage. User cannot make an attack on their turn.

${ModID}:TakeOnesLife.NAME: And Take One's Life
${ModID}:TakeOnesLife.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Target takes damage next turn equal to unblocked damage dealt.
